entities.name: nagini
entities.description: Nagini is a snake that has been released by Hermione. It is described as 'the snake' and is said to be 'thrashing' in the room.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is a person who has released Nagini. She is described as diving aside with a shriek and hitting the curtained window with her curse.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is a person who is being attacked by Nagini. He is described as ducking to avoid another shower of broken glass and snatching up his wand.

relationships.description: Nagini attacks Harry, smacking him hard in the face. This is described as 'the snake flew into the air, smacking Harry hard in the face'.
Hermione releases Nagini. This is described as 'Nagini had released him' and 'she was nowhere to be seen'.
